short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ensure Chrome notifications enabled on your device. Input text, click 'Start Tracking', and get notified when the content appears.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Content Tracker helps you monitor specific text on any webpage and alerts you instantly with a notification when it appears. Ideal for tracking updates, the extension runs in the background and works independently on each tab. Stay informed without constantly refreshing the page!
